Package org.opends.sdk.util

Interface Summary
ByteSequence A ByteSequence is a readable sequence of byte values.
Function<M,N,P> Functions transform input values of type M to output values of type N.
LocalizableException This interface should be implemented by any exception interfaces that expose a localizable error message.
Predicate<M,P> Predicates transform input values of type M to a boolean output value and are typically used for performing filtering.
 

Class Summary
ASCIICharProp A ASCIICharProp provides fast access to ASCII character properties.
Base64 This class provides methods for performing base64 encoding and decoding.
ByteSequenceOutputStream An adapter class that allows writing to an byte string builder with the outputstream interface.
ByteSequenceReader An interface for iteratively reading date from a ByteSequence .
ByteString An immutable sequence of bytes backed by a byte array.
ByteStringBuilder A mutable sequence of bytes backed by a byte array.
Functions Common Function implementations.
Iterables Utility methods for manipulating Iterables.
Iterators Utility methods for manipulating Iterators.
Platform Provides a wrapper class that collects all of the JVM vendor and JDK version specific code in a single place.
SizeLimitInputStream An implementation of input stream that enforces an read size limit.
SSLUtils Created by IntelliJ IDEA.
StaticUtils Common utility methods.
StringPrepProfile This class defines the "stringprep" profile as defined in RFC 4518.
SubstringReader Created by IntelliJ IDEA.
Validator Common methods for validating method arguments.
 

Exception Summary
InterruptedIOException An InterruptedIOException adapts an InterruptedException to an IOException.
LocalizedIllegalArgumentException Thrown to indicate that a method has been passed an illegal or inappropriate argument.
